## Table of results

```{r mean-age-bmi-table}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
nhanes_small %>%
  filter(
    !is.na(diabetes),
    !is.na(phys_active)
  ) %>%
  group_by(
    diabetes,
    education
  ) %>%
  summarise(
    max_bmi = max(bmi, na.rm = TRUE),
    min_bmi = min(bmi, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>% 
ungroup() %>% 
  knitr::kable(caption = "Mean Values of Age and bmi for each diabetes and physical activity status")
```
